title: Formula Staying the Same
text: When copying a formula from one cell to another, the formula changes accordingly.

title: Updates to I formula
text: Moving the formula from Column H to Column I would automatically update the formula to reference Column I in place of H.

title: Updates to H formula
text: The formula would not automatically update to be an absolute reference unless it is manually changed to be an absolute reference.

title: Copy Formulas
text: Users have the ability to copy formulas from one cell to another.
